channel.title: 2 Errors Compiled - Please Help me
channel.description:
Well i was following a tutorial on a gambling system with an npc and well i got two errors and i do not know how to fix them. Tutorial I Followed - [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/485205-pi-slot-machine-v-1-2-a.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/485205-pi-slot-machine-v-1-2-a.html[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lhl5zG2.png[/img]

item.title: 2 Errors Compiled - Please Help me
item.dc:creator: @Planet_X Planet X
item.description:
@Planet_X wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:549987”][quote author=Planet X link=topic=668864.msg4473183#msg4473183 date=1424283857]
req and found strings arent equal
[/quote]
Now explain it. Not everyone understands the errors.

OP:

You have the method sendNpcChat4, and it wants you to have the following pattern:
String String String String int String int.

Which would look a bit like:

And this is what you put:
String String String String int String.
Which means you’re missing a number after the last String.

Now, I don’t know what the two numbers stand for, as I do not have your code.
I can only assume the first digit is the npc’s ID, and the second their emotion or the zoom.
You’d have to show me the method which is in your DialogueHandler.java[/quote]

Sorry been awhile, but sk8er explained it well, u should post your code for him though for better understanding on exactly what needs to be fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Errors Compiled - Please Help me

Now explain it. Not everyone understands the errors.

OP:

You have the method sendNpcChat4, and it wants you to have the following pattern:

Which means you’re missing a number after the last String.
